metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9029 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libmatio.a in matio (aka MAT File I/O Library) 1.5.13. There is an out-of-bounds read with a SEGV in the function Mat_VarReadNextInfo5() in mat5.c.

criterions.comment: libmatio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
